projects.title: Bleacher Report
projects.description: Bleacher Report is one of the leading sports media apps in the U.S., offering real-time alerts, scores, video content, and personalized coverage for major leagues including the NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, WNBA, NCAA, and global football. At Warner Bros. Discovery, I contributed to the development and scaling of the app, building key features such as real-time betting integrations using DraftKings API, live video streaming, and sports score tracking. My work spanned multiple leagues and included personalization, content delivery, and performance optimizations ‚Äî all contributing to a high-quality fan experience across millions of users.

projects.title: VanMoof
projects.description: Get the most out of your Electrified or SmartBike with the VanMoof app. Lock or unlock your bike, check its battery levels, and remember where you parked it ‚Äì all from your phone.

projects.title: Tiqets
projects.description: The Tiqets app opens the doors of culture to those who don‚Äôt want to wait in culture‚Äôs long lines! Whether you‚Äôre at home or already traveling, you can browse cultural attractions, read venue reviews, and purchase paperless tickets without leaving the app. With tickets delivered instantly to your smartphone, and many skip-the-line options, never again must you spend needless time waiting in line.

projects.title: Temper
projects.description: Temper is THE platform for FreeFlex work. We make working for yourself easy. With a super easy platform and enough shifts in the best places. By choosing where, when and at what rate you work, you align your work with your private life instead of the other way around. There are 8,000 new freelance catering and retail shifts in your area every week. You can easily start as a freelancer via our platform. Create a profile on Temper and score your first freelance assignment today.

projects.title: Hoof
projects.description: Hoof is an online social network where football athletes can record their activities, compare performance, and compete with their community. Think of Strava for football.
